description:
Is COVID still really a thing or are people just ready to get on with life? Like aside from the mask wearing to go into certain businesses I’ve just been over here livin. 

Can we all agree that it’s time to carry on?! Like one minute the CDC is recommending everyone go get tested and now they’re saying don’t go get tested. One minute Toni Fauci is saying we look like we’re going to have a record speed promising vaccine and the next minute he is saying the fast forwarding of the vaccine could be dangerous and he isn’t sure if it will be effective. 

I see what’s going on here. It’s called politics! It’s time to get back to life and stop being swayed by the BS. The media is determined to keep us all fighting and keeping us believing the lies of whatever political party they are funded by. 

The Solution?? Make your own informed decisions and don’t watch the news! And for me personally, I’ve been limiting my social media time. It seems whenever I open Facebook, outside of making a post, all that I see is NEGATIVITY, VIOLENCE, and HATRED. It can make you feel like the world is coming to an end. 

I am choosing to MOVE ON! 
#overcovid19 #plandemic2020
